Literature.Title: Improving the Therapeutic Index of Smp24, a Venom-Derived Antimicrobial Peptide: Increased Activity against Gram-Negative Bacteria
Literature.Author: Rawson KM, Lacey MM, Strong PN, Miller K

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:LD50=29 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=23 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(LD50=42µg/ml),Escherichia coli JM109(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli JM109(MBC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H085180216(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H085180216(MBC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SH1000(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SH1000(MBC=16µg/ml)
